user_sentiment: cautiously satisfied but with technical concerns
execution_quality: Good execution with appropriate tool usage and error recovery, though the user's follow-up indicates the implementation approach needs refinement regarding cache invalidation logic.
work_category: Configuration refactoring to improve build caching behavior by integrating environment variable handling directly into the Flutter build spec instead of using a wrapper script.
summary: Agent successfully replaced the wrapper-based approach with direct environment variable integration in the Flutter build spec, but implemented a naive cache invalidation strategy that rebuilds on every env change. The user's follow-up clarifies they want conditional caching logic based on whether a key was present, indicating the initial implementation missed the nuanced caching requirements and will need further refinement.
follow_up_pattern: User is providing clarification on desired caching behavior (remember builds unless explicitly refreshed, but recheck if using fallback), indicating they want the agent to modify the cache invalidation logic to be more intelligent about when to rebuild.
